reviewText: We love Horseland at our house, and we have all three DVDs.  This one is our favorite- highly recommended!

This show is awesome.  My girls (ages 5 & 7) LOVE this show, and I can sit through it as well :)  The episodes are action-packed, edgy enough to be interesting to my girls, but still wholesome with nice life-lessons.  The horses are great, the storylines are engaging, and I highly recommend this series.  We also have the first one, Friends First, which is great too.
Great stories for girls who love horses.
My young granddaughters just loved this series.  They have enjoyed those videos and have watched them over and over again.

I bought this under the impression it was a movie.  I already have the complete series and the episodes on this video are duplicates of the complete series.  For the price of this video I ordered the complete series which is what I would recommend to others.
It was shipped quickly. It was in great condition. We watch it about every day. It's my horse loving daughters favorite!

My 3 yr old is obsessed with horses & she loves all the Horseland DVDs. They are cute stories and also usually have moral lessons included. My 5 yr old, who doesnt' have a horse obsession, likes these shows as well.

My 3 yr old is obsessed with horses & she loves all the Horseland DVDs. They are cute stories and also usually have moral lessons included. My 5 yr old, who doesnt' have a horse obsession, likes these shows as well.
My kids love this cartoons. They are cute and funny. They are clean and great for any age. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
My kids are 5 and 10 - both love this show!  The website is great too!  I reccomend these dvd's for girls of any age.
